slides.title: 10,000 Local Readers

content.headline: 10,000+ Local Subscribers Open This Newsletter Every Week

slides.narration: Ten thousand local subscribers open our community newsletter every week. They're looking for local businesses, local events, local recommendations. Your business could be inside, in front of the exact audience you want to reach.

slides.title: Newsletter Stats
slides.narration: Here's why newsletter advertising works. Ten thousand eight hundred forty-seven active subscribers. Forty-seven percent average open rate—more than double the industry average. Twelve percent click-through rate—nearly five times industry average. Eighty-two percent homeowners, seventy-three percent household decision-makers. One hundred percent within a fifteen-mile radius. This is your exact audience.

slides.title: Ad Options
slides.narration: Choose your visibility level. Featured Sponsor: top of the entire newsletter, one hundred percent of opens see it first. Section Sponsor: top of a specific section like events or business news—contextual relevance. Display Ad: in-content placement with natural integration. Event Highlight: perfect if you're promoting an event or time-limited offer.

slides.title: Your Ad Preview

content.headline: Here's What Your Ad Could Look Like

preview.headline: Sample headline for your business
preview.description: Sample description highlighting your key offering
preview.link: Tracks to your website or listing

content.note: We'll create the final version based on your input

slides.narration: Here's what your ad could look like. Your business name prominently displayed. A headline that grabs attention. A description highlighting your key offering. A clear call to action. And a tracked link so you know exactly how many people clicked. We'll create the final version based on what you want to promote.

slides.title: Advertiser Results

content.headline: What Other Advertisers See
content.average_cpc: Average cost per click: $0.47 (Google Ads local avg: $2-5)

slides.narration: What do other advertisers see? A local restaurant got one hundred forty-seven clicks and twenty-three reservations from one ad. A home services company got eighty-nine clicks and twelve quote requests. A retail shop got two hundred thirty-four clicks, coupon redeemed forty-one times. Average cost per click: forty-seven cents. Compare that to two to five dollars for Google Ads. This is efficient reach.

slides.title: Book Your Spot

content.headline: Ready to Reach 10,000 Local Subscribers?
content.urgency: Next newsletter sends Thursday—book by Tuesday to be included

slides.narration: Ready to reach ten thousand local subscribers? Book your newsletter ad now. Next newsletter sends Thursday—book by Tuesday to be included. Or see the full media kit for all options and pricing. Ten thousand people, your exact audience, waiting to hear about you.
